name: Portable Toilet
description: This portable toilet is enhanced with cutting-edge military technology from Kronstadt Industries, designed to expand upon contact with the ground. Beyond its size-adjusting capabilities, this innovative device serves as an attraction point for any nearby NPCs feeling unwell, making it an indispensable tool for any discerning assassin.
